contact.name: Name
contact.successMessage: Thank you for contacting me. I will get back to you soon.

0.title: Java Enterprise & Microservices
0.desc: My core expertise lies in building robust, scalable backend systems using Java and the Spring Ecosystem. I specialize in designing RESTful APIs and Microservices architectures, ensuring high performance and security for enterprise-grade applications.

1.title: DevOps & Cloud Native
1.desc: I don't just write code; I ship it. I have hands-on experience with DevOps practices including Docker containerization, Kubernetes orchestration, and CI/CD pipelines. I focus on automating workflows to ensure reliable and fast deployments.

2.title: Full Stack JavaScript (MERN)
2.desc: Versatility is my strength. Beyond Java, I master the JavaScript ecosystem. I build dynamic user interfaces with React.js and develop lightweight, non-blocking backends using Node.js and Express. This allows me to adapt to any technical stack required.

3.title: AI Integration (Spring AI)
3.desc: I am passionate about the future of tech. I integrate Artificial Intelligence into web solutions using Spring AI, bridging the gap between traditional software development and LLMs to create smart, data-driven applications.

4.title: Agile & Collaborative Workflow
4.desc: Trained in active pedagogy, I thrive in Agile/Scrum environments. I am proficient in using Jira for project management, participating in sprints, and collaborating effectively via Git/GitHub. I value clean code and continuous learning.

0.title: YouCode (UM6P)
0.detail: Intensive training based on active pedagogy (Simplon). Mastery of modern technologies (Spring Boot / Angular), Agile/Scrum methodology and completion of concrete projects.

1.detail: Acquisition of fundamentals in computer science, mathematics and algorithmic logic. Validation of two years of higher education.

2.title: Lyc√©e Akensous
2.detail: Mathematical Sciences option A. Acquisition of strong analytical and logical thinking.

0.title: YouCode (Academic Projects)
0.desc: Development of complex web applications. Team work, version management (Git/GitHub) and respect of deadlines.

1.title: Freelance & Self-learning
1.desc: Period dedicated to self-learning. Exploration of Web development basics, completion of technical challenges and strengthening of programming logic.

recommendationsData.name: Shahmir Minhas
recommendationsData.designation: React JS | NEXT JS | Node | GraphQL
recommendationsData.view: Hey everyone! I wanted to take a moment to recommend Osama Javaid for any React.js opportunities. I had the pleasure of working with him on multiple projects where he showcased a strong understanding of React.js and Next.js concepts and delivered high-quality code. He consistently demonstrated a willingness to learn and grow, and his enthusiasm for tackling new challenges was contagious. Osama is a reliable and dedicated team member who would be a great asset to any React.js team. Highly recommended! üëç! üåü

recommendationsData.name: Sikandar Hayat
recommendationsData.designation: Data Scientist | Machine Learning Engineer | Python Developer
recommendationsData.view: I had the privilege of working alongside Osama on multiple university projects, and I must say, his talent and work ethic truly stood out. Recently, we were both part of the dynamic team at JMM Technologies, where Osama's professionalism and attention to detail shone brightly. I wholeheartedly endorse Osama for any opportunity that calls for a highly skilled and dedicated individual.

recommendationsData.name: Nasir Khan
recommendationsData.view: I wholeheartedly recommend Osama as a talented React frontend developer with an incredible flair for UI/UX design. His proficiency in Node.js further enhances his capabilities, allowing him to build robust and scalable applications. Osama's attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and dedication to delivering exceptional results make him a valuable addition to any development team.

recommendationsData.name: Muhammad Ullah
recommendationsData.view: I highly recommend Osama Javed for web frontend development positions. Their expertise in ReactJS and Next.js, combined with their professionalism and dedication, make them an invaluable asset to any team.

reviewsData.clientReview: It is always nice to work with him. The work is finished quickly and he does more than is asked of him. It is also clear that he has a lot of knowledge of the work he does. I look forward to our next collaboration.
He is very good with communication and experienced website developer, great experience to work with him.

Osama is extremely knowledgeable and helpful. He knows in and out of web app development . His understanding of different technologies and frameworks in the space is also very impressive. I hope I get the chance to work with him again
I have worked with Osama and he is very professional and excellent software  developer. I admire his speed of development and quality of work when given an assignment.
